title: CryptoATM
author: CryptoATM
content: I have a plan to buy 10,000 Doge coin but at the same time I cant take my eye of Fantom, if you are in my shoe which one would you go for and why? Also has anyone heard about doge chain project? A friend talked about this and I want to ask.

comments.author: cryptoaddictchie
comments.body: Quote from: CryptoATM on August 22, 2022, 12:25:01 PMI have a plan to buy 10,000 Doge coin but at the same time I cant take my eye of Fantom, if you are in my shoe which one would you go for and why? Also has anyone heard about doge chain project? A friend talked about this and I want to ask. For me you either pick fantom instead of dogecoin.  It is an L1 with a lot of potentials and currently down a lot plus there are things a lot to do on fantom than simply holding a non utility dogecoin memecoin.  Aside from trading,  you can only used that as store of value,  if you are a fun blockchain user then youll find a project that can heavily attached to a lot of use cases and environment such as gaming,  finance,  defi, and many more.

comments.author: panjay
comments.body: why you don't buy both?doge has another alt party with their own chain L1. I think doge have more chance to make you more money, a lot of new things ala wild west, be careful for what you buy there.

comments.author: Yatsan
comments.body: It is always better to diversify your investment, in any industry or field, especially if you're unsure of the outome. It is somehow 'playing safe' from the possibility of loss. Putting everything in one bucket will put you on edge between losing everything or winning bigtime. So think about winning not as much as you wanted to, but having that higher tendency to avoid loss.This is crypto industry we are talking about. Everything is uncertain, no matter how good your TAs are, things just don't work as always as you plan it to be. The goal is to lessen the risk of losing.

comments.author: CuriousGeorge
comments.body: Buying fantom gives you more benefit compared with doge coin. Why? it has more utilities. Are you taking a rumour about doge chain project seriously? Diversify your money can also become one of best choice in this case i think that fantom is far better in term of fundamental from project unlike doge coin which was only rely from the hype but yeah elon doesn't have any impact anymore to the meme coin. That may make meme coin being so difficult to get crazy increase

comments.author: bittraffic
comments.body: Pick Doge. It's decentralized, it wouldn't be in the top 10 if there is no reason for it to be there. They may call it just a memecoin but we know it's close to Bitcoin where there is no founder which no one controls. I bet my life the next bull run, Doge will sweep the shittier coins above the CMC.The price is also one reason to pick Doge. Fantom doesn't sound like there is a big community behind it.

comments.author: Balmain
comments.body: You can choose both, you probably won't make all your money in a single coin. You add Doge and Phantom in half or one or two major coins. Doge is a decentralized asset with millions of followers. I said you can add one or two projects, these can be good layer 2 projects. There are projects with tools such as nft, defi web3, which work well in their own network and make volume.

comments.author: 5W-KILO
comments.body: Mere looking at things its easier to go with fantom because of its use case but doge coin is a must, if I found myself in this circumstance I will split up the money and go for both, pretty hard to make a decision here, even if its 50$ I have I would invest 25$ in both. Never Leave A Good Coin Behind

comments.author: bitcampaign
comments.body: I will choose doge where Elon Musk is still with them and also has many large communities out there as holders, of course what is expected is that Doge can be used as a means of payment for companies owned by Elon

comments.author: Doell
comments.body: Dividing in both is better than you taking one of them, suppose one of them gets a pump maybe you will feel a little dissatisfied. Fantom is good but Dogecoin isn't bad either because this is not an ordinary meme that likes to be pump or dump, Dogecoin is another alternative in some businesses e.g. gambling or real use on tesla elon industry, besides that many people still hold Doge for reasons we don't know. It will definitely be possible another pump in the future, although Fantom is better.

comments.author: Gayong88
comments.body: Quote from: CryptoATM on August 22, 2022, 12:25:01 PMAlso has anyone heard about doge chain project? A friend talked about this and I want to ask. I would choose Dogecoin because the current price is very promising and will likely increase exponentially in the years to come. The deciding factor for me is real-world utilities and applications and Elon Musk's dream of making Doge an interplanetary cryptocurrency to support the interplanetary commerce mission seems to be getting closer.

comments.author: coinerer
comments.body: By fundamental analysis everyone will choose the Fantom because it has real use case. It can move to good position after certain time. But doge coin has nothing just a meme coin. If we mention Elon Musk then any good coin can not give you profit equal to this doge coin. It is better to invest in two coins. Many people want to invest in Fantom because they don't want to go under any circumstances like winning the lottery.

comments.author: S3300
comments.body: Quote from: Wapfika on August 22, 2022, 03:08:11 PMQuote from: CryptoATM on August 22, 2022, 12:25:01 PMI have a plan to buy 10,000 Doge coin but at the same time I cant take my eye of Fantom, if you are in my shoe which one would you go for and why? Also has anyone heard about doge chain project? A friend talked about this and I want to ask. Doge is a ticking time bomb if you are asking me personally. It has unlimited supply without token burn mechanism and the only thing that keeps his price holding on is the fact that Elon must is supporting it and a chance to pump it again in the future. This is the reason why there are still many blind followers that keeps holding and buying this dip even though they are just buying a falling dagger. I would suggest you to purchase Fantom without a second thoughts. Dogecoin is just for leisure investment.That's one reason why I will invest in both, no one can really tell what will happen to any project so instead of making some guess is rather take risk on both project, in this crypto space any project can do wonders, just any, even the ones that people don't talk about or call shit projects.

comments.author: monineklutak
comments.body: Quote from: bitcampaign on August 22, 2022, 02:55:00 PMI will choose doge where Elon Musk is still with them and also has many large communities out there as holders, of course what is expected is that Doge can be used as a means of payment for companies owned by ElonI don't think it's a bad decision but indeed we must know that the risk will always exist,hope doge will continue to grow considering they have a large community,Of course it will help to grow and we will see what will happen in the future

comments.author: rhomelmabini
comments.body: Quote from: CryptoATM on August 22, 2022, 12:25:01 PMI have a plan to buy 10,000 Doge coin but at the same time I cant take my eye of Fantom, if you are in my shoe which one would you go for and why? Also has anyone heard about doge chain project? A friend talked about this and I want to ask. A no brainer for me is to pick Dogecoin. It wouldn't set an eye for Vitalik to continue supporting the foundation, he even donated for about $1 billion in ETH to prove that he's into it. Well, the thing is that you'll decide for it after all but I'm just giving you a clue.

comments.author: cloudfir3e
comments.body: Quote from: CryptoATM on August 22, 2022, 12:25:01 PMI have a plan to buy 10,000 Doge coin but at the same time I cant take my eye of Fantom, if you are in my shoe which one would you go for and why? Also has anyone heard about doge chain project? A friend talked about this and I want to ask. For now, I tend to prefer Fantom over Doge, even though I used to benefit from trading Dogecoin.The reason for preferring Fantom is because Fantom itself is a state-of-the-art blockchain project that provides a platform for building customized decentralized applications and non-exchangeable tokens.has a direct acylic graph (DAG) smart contract platform. it can increase scalability and transaction speed which can increase to more than 300k per second.Fantom is powered by the power of Lachesis built on the Ethereum blockchain, due to its fast and efficient platform, leading blockchain project

comments.author: Nrcewker
comments.body: Quote from: CryptoATM on August 22, 2022, 12:25:01 PMI have a plan to buy 10,000 Doge coin but at the same time I cant take my eye of Fantom, if you are in my shoe which one would you go for and why? Also has anyone heard about doge chain project? A friend talked about this and I want to ask. Choosing Doge is the worst decision.I don’t know much about Fantom, but I guess it might be better than Doge atleast.I am asking you, why the hell you want to buy these shitty alts?Currently the price of Bitcoins are at it’s best. Just buy as many Bitcoins as you can and save it for long term.Once the bear market gets over, you will definitely get at least 3times of your investment. Think again before investing my friend.

comments.author: virasisog
comments.body: Quote from: Nrcewker on August 22, 2022, 04:09:54 PMQuote from: CryptoATM on August 22, 2022, 12:25:01 PMI have a plan to buy 10,000 Doge coin but at the same time I cant take my eye of Fantom, if you are in my shoe which one would you go for and why? Also has anyone heard about doge chain project? A friend talked about this and I want to ask. Choosing Doge is the worst decision.I don’t know much about Fantom, but I guess it might be better than Doge atleast.I am asking you, why the hell you want to buy these shitty alts?Currently the price of Bitcoins are at it’s best. Just buy as many Bitcoins as you can and save it for long term.Once the bear market gets over, you will definitely get at least 3times of your investment. Think again before investing my friend.Altcoins could also be as profitable as Bitcoin but the difference is, that BTC could provide a higher assurance when it comes to profitability. I don't know much about Fantom either but I guess buying Doge won't be a wise idea. You can still pick higher potential altcoins than a meme coin. There are still good top coins that you could buy since you have a big fund.

comments.author: cryptobadshah
comments.body: Doge has millions of followers these can be layer two projects tools like nft defi web3 operate well in their own network and make volume diversifying your money can also be a good choice in this situation fantom is a better project than doge coin which simply relied on hype meme currency is so hard to earn it may be playing safe against loss Putting everything in one bucket makes you vulnerable to losing or winning big think about winning less than you 'd like but avoiding losing more the cryptocurrency industry no matter how good your knowledge nothing goes as planned to lower the risk of loss.

comments.author: fvb
comments.body: Quote from: CryptoATM on August 22, 2022, 12:25:01 PMI have a plan to buy 10,000 Doge coin but at the same time I cant take my eye of Fantom, if you are in my shoe which one would you go for and why? Also has anyone heard about doge chain project? A friend talked about this and I want to ask. In my humble opinion Fantom looks more promising. Maybe it's because I don't like all the memes, although Doge has done well recently. And yet my choice is FTM because it has all the key indicators for growth in the future.
